Class TwitterException

  • Object
    • Throwable
      • Exception
        • RuntimeException
          • com.twitter.sdk.android.core.TwitterException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    TwitterApiException, TwitterAuthException

    public class TwitterException
extends RuntimeException
    Represents a Twitter error. Base class for all Twitter related exceptions.
